src_original: [p. 67] māyā paravañcanāyā abhūtārthasandarśanā /  lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya paravañcanābhiprāyeṇānyathā vyavasthitasya śīlāder arthasyānyathā prakāśanā /
tgt_original: 云何為誑？ 為獲利譽矯現有德詭詐為性，能障不誑邪命為業。

src_original: iyaṃ ca yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayate tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyate -- iti krodhādivat prajñaptita eva ,  na dravyataḥ /  mithyājīvasanniśrayadānakarmikā /  kāyavākkuhanopāttāḥ śayyāsanādaya upajīvyante ,  na ca vyāyāmalabdhā iti mithyājīva ucyate //
tgt_original: 謂矯誑者心懷異謀多現不實，邪命事故。 此即貪癡一分為體，離二無別誑相用故。

src_original: svadoṣapracchādanopāyasaṅgṛhītaṃ cetasaḥ kauṭilyaṃ /  svadoṣapracchādanopāyaḥ paravyāmohanam /  tat punar anyenānyat pratisarati kṣipaty aparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /  ata eva śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣād bhidyate /  svadoṣapracchādanopāyasaṅgrahas tannimittatvāt /
tgt_original: 為網他故矯設異儀險曲為性，能障不諂教誨為業。

src_original: cetasaḥ kauṭilyaṃ vaṅkatā ,  yasya yogāc cittam ṛjumārgaṃ na pratipadyate /  idaṃ ca lābhasatkārādhyavasito yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyāṃ svadoṣapracchādanārthaṃ paramohanāya pravartate ,  tayor eva sahitayos tat prajñapyate /
tgt_original: 謂諂曲者為網帽他，曲順時宜矯設方便，為取他意或藏己失，不任師友正教誨故。

src_original: ayaṃ ca sarvakleśopakleśasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //  vividhair vadhabandhanatāḍanatarjanādibhiḥ sattvānāṃ hiṃsā vihiṃsā /  viheṭhyante 'nayā sattvā vadhabandhanādibhir duḥkhadaurmanasyotpādanād iti viheṭhanā /  sā punaḥ pratighāṃśikā nirghṛṇatā niṣkaruṇatā nirdayatā ca /  etāś ca nirghṛṇatādayaḥ svayaṃ vadhādiṃ kurvataḥ kārayataḥ paraiś ca kriyamāṇān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vānumodataś ca yathākramaṃ boddhavyāḥ ,
tgt_original: 於諸有情心無悲愍損惱為性，能障不害逼惱為業。
